text: Ri Pablo, ri Silvano1:1 Are xuqujeꞌ Silas, are waꞌ ri achi ri xukꞌam bꞌik ri Pablo are xubꞌusolij ri kojonelabꞌ chukabꞌ mul. Hechos 15:40. xuqujeꞌ ri Timoteo chike ri e kojonelabꞌ ri e kꞌo pa ri komontyox ke ri aꞌj Tesalónica, chiꞌwe ix ri ix rech ri Dios xuqujeꞌ ri Tataxel rachiꞌl ri Ajawxel Jesucristo:
